alert.note: Alert for Sherman (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 25 at 10:55PM CDT until July 25 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM MDT FOR CENTRAL SHERMAN COUNTY... At 954 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles northeast of Goodland, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Mesonet. At 9:50pm MT Goodland Airport reported a 63 mph wind gust. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Goodland, Ruleton and Edson. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 9 and 35. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
